Key Match Events: Aaron Civale and Aaron Ashby combined on a two-hit shutout
Garrett Mitchell hit a one-out homer to right-center
Jackson Chourio drove in two runs
Contreras went 2 for 3 and drove in a run
Post-Match Reflections: Brewers manager Pat Murphy praised the team's competitiveness
Giants manager Bob Melvin criticized his team's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Civale worked seven innings for his longest outing of the season
Mitchell hit a one-out homer to right-center
Chourio greeted Sean Hjelle with a two-run double to right
Contreras slid across the plate without a throw and was credited with a steal of home
